trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the compiler should include a reference to the target project's primary output assembly.
trans-unit.target: A value indicating whether the compiler should include a reference to the target project's primary output assembly.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the primary output of the reference target should be copied into this project's output directory, when that metadata is set on an unresolved reference.
trans-unit.target: Indicates whether the primary output of the reference target should be copied into this project's output directory, when that metadata is set on an unresolved reference.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the satellite assemblies of the reference target should be copied into this project's output directory.
trans-unit.target: Indicates whether the satellite assemblies of the reference target should be copied into this project's output directory.

trans-unit.source: the Guid the solution tracks an individual project reference target with
trans-unit.target: the Guid the solution tracks an individual project reference target with

trans-unit.source: The old (VS2010 beta) way to store the Guid the solution tracks an individual project reference target with
trans-unit.target: The old (VS2010 beta) way to store the Guid the solution tracks an individual project reference target with

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the reference will be copied to the output directory.
trans-unit.target: Indicates whether the reference will be copied to the output directory.
